snippet.textDisplay: The perfect summer tropical theme to relax with a nice drink, I especially like the flute break at 0:57. Captain Rainbow seems to be a great game but was a commercial failure. I feel bad for Skip Ltd really, they never found success with their games: the Chibi-Robo series was only mildly successful with its first game, and both Giftpia and CR never left Japan. They are all very unique games and that may unfortunately be the reason for their failure, people can be turned off by games that look too weird. The great news is that this game has a fan translation so I'll definitely give it a shot one day.
snippet.textOriginal: The perfect summer tropical theme to relax with a nice drink, I especially like the flute break at 0:57. Captain Rainbow seems to be a great game but was a commercial failure. I feel bad for Skip Ltd really, they never found success with their games: the Chibi-Robo series was only mildly successful with its first game, and both Giftpia and CR never left Japan. They are all very unique games and that may unfortunately be the reason for their failure, people can be turned off by games that look too weird. The great news is that this game has a fan translation so I'll definitely give it a shot one day.

"...people can be turned off by games that look too weird."
And yet, the Katamari series struck gold.

snippet.textDisplay: that was so cool,paradise music i never knew about that.Thank you Supradarky, always excellent service!

snippet.textDisplay:
Never forget that it was the good captain here that got Little Mac back on his feet and in shape for a new Punch-Out!! on the Wii and eventual inclusion as playable in Smash Bros. 4

Thank you for your noble service, Nick.

snippet.textDisplay: Only ever heard of this game, so thanks for introducing me to this really chilled out song.

snippet.textDisplay: Much more chill of a song than what I was expecting from a game called "Captain Rainbow" with that picture.
